General.Name: SANGBO Corp
General.Description: Sangbo Corp. develops, manufactures, and sells display parts and nano materials worldwide. The company's display products include optical sheet for the use in LCDs, prism sheets, diffuser sheets, and tablet and mobile display optical films. Its window film products comprise carbon films, carbon ceramic films, and paint protection films; screen deco films, AGNW transparent conductive films; new material BU products, including QD films, CNT, pedot TCF, graphene barrier films, and screen protection films. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Gimpo, South Korea.

2.Name: Cheol-Ho  Ahn
2.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Head of the Factory
